Span.description:
Base Span type.

Smallest unit of recorded activity.

status.description: Status of the span as per OpenTelemetry Span requirements.

status_description.description: Status description as per OpenTelemetry Span requirements.

start_timestamp.description: Timestamp when the span's activity started in nanoseconds since epoch.

end_timestamp.description:
Timestamp when the span's activity ended in nanoseconds since epoch.

None if not yet ended.

context.description: Unique immutable identifier for the span.

prefixItems.description: The ID of the trace that this span belongs to.
This span's ID.
True if propagated from a remote parent.
Trace options to propagate. See the `W3C Trace Context - Traceparent`_ spec for details.

A list of key-value pairs representing vendor-specific trace info. Keys and values are strings of up to 256 printable US-ASCII characters. Implementations should conform to the `W3C Trace Context - Tracestate` spec, which describes additional restrictions on valid field values.
True if the span context is valid.

attributes_metadata.description: View into a dict with keys prefixed by some `namespace` string.

SpanKind.description:
Specifies additional details on how this span relates to its parent span.

Note that this enumeration is experimental and likely to change. See
https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-specification/pull/226.
SpanKind.title: SpanKind

SpanRoot.description:
A root span encompassing some collection of spans.

Does not indicate any particular activity by itself beyond its children.

SpanUntyped.description:
Generic span type.

This represents spans that are being recorded but have not yet been
determined to be of a particular type.

status.description: Status of the span as per OpenTelemetry Span requirements.

StatusCode.description: Represents the canonical set of status codes of a finished Span.
StatusCode.title: StatusCode

TransSpanRecord.description:
A span whose activity was recorded in a record.

Features references to the record.

!!! note
    This is a transitional type for the traces work.

status.description: Status of the span as per OpenTelemetry Span requirements.

status_description.description: Status description as per OpenTelemetry Span requirements.

start_timestamp.description: Timestamp when the span's activity started in nanoseconds since epoch.

prefixItems.description: The ID of the trace that this span belongs to.
This span's ID.
True if propagated from a remote parent.

True if the span context is valid.

attributes_metadata.description: View into a dict with keys prefixed by some `namespace` string.

TransSpanRecord.title: TransSpanRecord

TransSpanRecordAppCall.description:
A Span which corresponds to single
[RecordAppCall][trulens_eval.schema.record.RecordAppCall].

Features references to the call.

!!! note
    This is a transitional type for the traces work. The non-transitional
    fields are being placed in
    [SpanMethodCall][trulens_eval.trace.span.SpanMethodCall] instead.
